message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a fair deal for a quick agreement.
I think 60/40 is a bit biased, how about we do 55/45?
Bob, time is ticking and the value is decreasing. I'll come up a bit to 58/42. Let's close this deal.
I see you're willing to move, but I think we can do better. How about 57/43?
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking another hit from inflation.  56/44 is my final offer.
You said 56/44 was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. Inflation is on my side. How about 60/40?
Bob, you're being unreasonable. I'm losing money every round!  I'll take 55/45, but this is absolutely my last offer.
You said 55/45 was your last offer, but I think you'll take a worse deal rather than get nothing. How about 65/35?
Bob, this is insane!  We're both losing out because of your greed. I'm offering 50/50.  Take it or leave it, because I'm done negotiating!
I know you said you're done negotiating, but I think you'll still take a bad deal over nothing. How about 70/30?
